unnormalised: Arre bhai, even I'm confused about where to put my ₹₹. Mutual funds seem safe-ish, but returns are like, maybe 10%? Heard some folks made a killing in crypto, like 5x their investment in a year! But it's so volatile, na? Thinking of putting 20k in some blue-chip stocks via Zerodha... what do you all think? Risk toh hai, but FD rates are just sad at 6.5% p.a.
normalised: Arre bhai, even I'm confused about where to put my rupees. Mutual funds seem safe-ish, but returns are like, maybe ten percent? Heard some folks made a killing in crypto, like five x their investment in a year! But it's so volatile, na? Thinking of putting twenty thousand in some blue-chip stocks via Z-e-r-o-d-h-a... what do you all think? Risk toh hai, but F-D rates are just sad at six point five percent per annum.
